data.name: 纸人：第一章（Paper Dolls Original）
data.detailed_description:
The man drove his daughter to his separated wife's house. On the way, this man suffering from depression, but immersed in the memories of the past, can not extricate himself. In a trance, a sudden car accident made a man unconscious.

When a man wakes up, he finds himself in an abandoned ancient Chinese house. Is it a dream? Is it hallucination? Or the disorder of time and space? Following her daughter's voice, she explored and pursued in the eerie and gloomy ancient house, but all of this seemed not accidental. As we explore the interior of the ancient house step by step, all seemingly unrelated mysteries gradually merge together the truth of the story that has been buried for a hundred years.

Did the man find his daughter and leave safely with her?

"Where on earth is this?" Why am I here? What is the origin of all this with me?

Exploring horrible old houses
In the dark and gloomy old house of the late Qing Dynasty, you searched for your daughter's trace, accompanied by thrilling music, and you moved forward in fear and anxiety.

Logical Reasoning of Brain Burning
There are many obstacles in the way of finding a daughter. As the past of the ancient house is gradually unveiled, the truth of the matter is about to come out.

An omnipresent enemy
Mysterious and evil enemies follow, and behind every danger there seems to be a terrible figure.

Choose how to live
It's possible to survive only by overcoming fear, but when you think it's all over, the real story is just beginning.


Explore, adventure, hide, chase, heartbeat and solve multiple puzzles in ancient houses. Step by step, get to know the hidden truth in the story.

Please note that sound is an important basis for story plot and danger prediction. Please wear headphones before playing


Careful and realistic production, create a very real dark and gloomy century-old house.
Unique innovative mobile design fundamentally avoids the dizziness of the vast majority of people, immersing in it for hours is not a problem.
Unique Oriental culture, mysterious old house in the late Qing Dynasty; a complete story line runs through the whole game, step by step in exploring and solving riddles, interpreting the origin behind the ancient house.
The total length of the game is about 15 hours.
Music combines ethnic, rock and roll, singing, with realistic sound effects, the feeling of immersion directly hit the brain of the terrible atmosphere.
The routing under your feet is measured step by step, and each mystery is uncovered by you.
Our design concept is not to frighten you, but to make you feel the dark atmosphere that makes you feel frightening. Experience the joy of exploring and overcome your fear of yourself.

Come with your courage. The Yin family welcomes you.
Join Paper Dolls official player group: 593774263, learn more!

data.short_description: Paper Dolls is a horror adventure secret room puzzle-solving game, carefully polished game scenes, a true restoration of the late Qing Dynasty and the early Republic of China style centuries old house, showing a unique Oriental culture.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750Ti or AMD RadeonR7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible（must support DirectX 9.0c or higher）
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-3770 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible（must support DirectX 9.0c or higher）

developers: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.

release_date.date: 人定已过 午夜将至
